amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Behavioral Health Services Act; act, how cited.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 71-801 to 71-830 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Behavioral Health Services Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB154, section 17, with LB603, section 3, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB603 became operative May 23, 2009. Changes made by LB154 became effective August 30, 2009.
